.. _wx.adv.AnimationType:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.adv.AnimationType**
==========================================================================================================================================



The `AnimationType` enumeration provides the following values:



================================================================================ ================================================================================
**Description**                                                                  **Value**
================================================================================ ================================================================================
``wx.adv.ANIMATION_TYPE_INVALID``                                                
``wx.adv.ANIMATION_TYPE_GIF``                                                    represents an animated ``GIF`` file.                      
``wx.adv.ANIMATION_TYPE_ANI``                                                    represents an ``ANI`` file.                      
``wx.adv.ANIMATION_TYPE_ANY``                                                    autodetect the filetype.                      
================================================================================ ================================================================================

|
